dc:title: St. Joseph the Wonder Worker
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An account of her prayers that were answered by St. Joseph in order to keep the C. W. operating, but always at poverty level. Describes her faith and the complete dependency on the patron saint of the C.W.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 102 1957-03-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
